representation_information.name: Office Open XML (OOXML, ISO/IEC 29500, ECMA 376) Format Family
representation_information.description: Overview of the family of formats defined by ISO/IEC 29500: Information technology -- Document description and processing languages -- Office Open XML File Formats. Includes DOCX, XLSX, and PPTX.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
